help.entry:
ASSIST
Usage: ASSIST <person in need>
If Quifael is being beaten senseless by a warg and you feel brave enough to help him, type ASSIST QUIFAEL to hit the warg. Note that the warg will keep hitting Quifael; assist only makes you start to fight whomever the person you're assisting is fighting.
> assist Doctor
See also: FLEE, KILL, RESCUE
